column6: You know your friends from growing up? The ones you went to high school with, and are to-this-day some of the people who know you best? Well, imagine there are only five kids in your high school, and you're all hated and feared by the world around you. Sometimes, it's nice to take a step back and realize that what you've been told is your "team" is really something much better-your best friends.
column8: | penciller (cover):Kris Anka | artist:Mahmud Asrar | writer:Brian Michael Bendis
